name: simple-memo
title: Simple Memo
description: A lightweight, keyboard-driven note-taking extension for instant  searching. Create, edit, and organize your notes with markdown support and quick search. Store and manage your memos locally without any external dependencies - your perfect second brain in Raycast.
author: rlagyrnjs12

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
